text: Apani bale dinah ya kichu bidhana ohira madhyame amara kache paumcheche, tanmadhye ami kona harama khadya pa'i na kona bhaksanakarira jan'ye, ya se bhaksana kare; kintu mrta athaba prabahita rakta athaba sukarera mansa eta apabitra athaba abaidha; yabeha kara jantu ya allaha chara an'yera name utsarga kara haya. Atapara ye ksudhaya katara haye pare ematabasthaya ye abadhyata kare na ebam simalangana kare na, niscaya apanara palanakarta ksamasila dayalu.
